    Basket - Class in catalogue
    A collection of products, used to record the products that are to be wished to be purchased.
    Basket() - Constructor for class catalogue.Basket
    Constructor for a basket which is used to represent a customer order/ wish list
    BetterBasket - Class in catalogue
    BetterBasket is a better version of Basket, including a merge of the products instead of making the list longer, which saves space and also it will sort the products by number.
    BetterBasket() - Constructor for class catalogue.BetterBasket
